services.title: Domestic Help
services.subtitle: Professional home cleaning
services.description: Book a professional housekeeper for your daily chores like brooming, mopping, dusting, dish-washing.

services.title: Cook
services.subtitle: Delicious home meals
services.description: Professional cooks and chefs to prepare delicious, nutritious home-cooked meals for your family.

services.title: Babysitter
services.subtitle: Caring for your little ones
services.description: Book a reliable babysitter/ japa for your young ones. Babysitters are experienced professionals who can take care of your babyâ€™s day-to-day needs like feeding, playing and putting to sleep. Japa maids are experts who take care of new born babies and mothers.

services.title: Elderly Care
services.subtitle: Compassionate support
services.description: Compassionate and trained caregivers providing dedicated 24-hour support and companionship for senior citizens.

services.title: All-Rounder
services.subtitle: Versatile home support
services.description: Versatile all-rounder staff capable of handling multiple household roles including cooking, cleaning, and general household management.

services.title: 24 Hrs Live-in
services.subtitle: Full time support
services.description: Verified and reliable 24 hrs live in workers. Feel free to customize your booking!

services.title: Patient Care
services.subtitle: Dedicated support for recovery
services.description: Specialized care for patients recovering from illness or surgery.

services.title: Peon Service
services.subtitle: Office and pantry assistance
services.description: Reliable staff for office maintenance, pantry management, and errands.

services.title: Japas
services.subtitle: Mother & Baby Care
services.description: Specialized care for newborns and mothers, including massage and recovery support.

subcategories.description: Authentic Indian home-style cooking service for delicious meals

Note : Cook will cook 1-2 dish per meal

Menu

Breads

  • Roti
  • Poori
  • Plain Paratha
  • Aloo Paratha
  • Gobhi Paratha
  • Pyaaz Paratha
  • Paneer Paratha

Sabzi (Dry)

  • Lauki ki sabzi
  • Tindey ki sabzi
  • Kaddu ki sabzi
  • Bhindi ki sabzi
  • Aloo methi
  • Aloo palak
  • Aloo jeera
  • Aloo gobhi
  • Aloo matar
  • Mixed veg

Sabzi (Gravy)

  • Aloo pyaaz tamatar
  • Matar paneer
  • Palak paneer
  • Kadi pakoda
  • Aloo soybean

Dal/Lentils

  • Dal tadka
  • Rajma
  • Chole
  • Chana aloo
  • Moong dal

Rice

  • Steamed rice / Boiled rice
  • Jeera rice
  • Veg pulao
  • Khichdi

Salad & Raita

  • Green salad (onion, cucumber, tomato)
  • Boondi raita
  • Veg raita

Breakfast

  • Poha
  • Sandwich
  • Aloo puri
  • Aloo parantha
  • Gobhi parantha
  • Pyaaz parantha
  • Paneer parantha

Non-Veg

  • Homestyle chicken
  • Egg curry
  • Omelette

subcategories.name: 2-12 Months Baby Care
subcategories.description: Babycare services for the well-being of your little one
subcategories.inclusions: Our babysitters in this category have expertise in all things related to diapers, formula milk, massaging, sterilising, bathing, burping, washing of clothes, taking care of hygiene, nail cutting, basic food for baby like daliyaa, khichdi, playing with babies and making them sleep, packing baby travel bag, etc.

subcategories.name: 5 Hours Per Day
subcategories.inclusions:
Floor, slab and basin cleaning only.

Pots will NOT be cleaned by safely hands workers. Cleaning chemicals, agents etc. have to be provided by client.

Please note: You are booking for specific hours/slots and we do not guarantee all selected tasks to be completed in that time-frame. It is only an estimate of the tasks for us to ensure service quality. The worker will only complete tasks possible in the booked time slot.

testimonials.name: Armaan
testimonials.message: Safely Hands truly lives up to its name. We hired a babysitter through them and the entire process was smooth and professional. The staff was background verified and well-trained. It gave us complete peace of mind. Highly recommended for families looking for trusted help!

testimonials.name: Neha Sharma, Ramganga Vihar
testimonials.message:
Complete Peace of Mind

As a working mother, finding a trustworthy babysitter was my biggest concern. Safely Hands made the entire process smooth and stress-free. The staff was verified, trained, and very caring with my child. I finally feel relaxed going to work. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Rekha (Babysitter)
testimonials.message:
Safe & Supportive Platform

Mujhe pehle stable kaam nahi milta tha. Safely Hands ne mujhe verified family ke saath connect kiya. Yahan safety aur support dono milta hai. Main bahut khush hoon.

testimonials.name: Pooja (Cook)
testimonials.message:
Training Se Confidence Mila


Safely Hands ki training se mujhe kaam karne ka confidence mila. Ab main professional tarike se kaam karti hoon aur mujhe time par payment milta hai. Yeh platform workers ke liye bahut accha hai.

testimonials.name: Sunita (Patient Care Attendant)
testimonials.message:
Patient Care Mein Growth

Maine patient care ka kaam Safely Hands ke through shuru kiya. Yahan mujhe training, guidance aur achhe employers mile. Main financially independent mehsoos karti hoon.

testimonials.name: Kavita (All-Rounder Helper)
testimonials.message:
Replacement & Support System

Agar kabhi family se match na ho to Safely Hands replacement ka option deta hai. Isse workers ko bhi tension nahi hoti. Team hamesha support karti hai.

testimonials.name: Rahul (Peon Service)
testimonials.message:
Regular Office Job Opportunity

Main pehle daily wage par kaam karta tha. Safely Hands ke through mujhe ek permanent office peon job mili. Ab mujhe regular salary milti hai aur kaam ka environment bhi professional hai.

testimonials.name: Anita (Elderly Care)
testimonials.message:
Dignity & Stability

Safely Hands ne mujhe ek stable job di jahan mujhe izzat milti hai. Employer bhi supportive hai aur payment system transparent hai.

testimonials.name: Meena (24 Hrs Live-in Helper)
testimonials.message:
Behtar Bhavishya

Is platform ki wajah se mujhe 24 ghante live-in job mili. Income better hai aur main apne parivaar ko financially support kar pa rahi hoon. Main Safely Hands ki thankful hoon.

teamMembers.name: Mohit Singh
teamMembers.title: Cleint aquisition Head  ( Building strong partnerships with client)
